articles.title: Protest to Japanese PM
articles.content:
Gifts to Kim Jong Il 
    Pyongyang, December 26 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il was presented with gifts by the head of the State Academy Beryozka Dancing Troupe of Russia 
Named after N. S. Nadezhdina and the head of the Russian State Academic People's Chorus Named after M. E. Pyatnichki on the occasion of the New Year.
 The gifts were conveyed separately to Kim Yong Jae, DPRK ambassador to Russia, on Dec. 21 by Head of the dancing troupe Mira Koltsova and Head of the chorus Aleksandra Permyakova.

articles.title: Annual Meeting of Poland-Korea Association Held
articles.content:
Protest to Japanese PM 
    Pyongyang, December 26 (KCNA) -- The Swiss Committee for Supporting the Independent and Peaceful Reunification of Korea sent a letter of protest to the Japanese prime minister on Dec. 19 in denunciation of the Japanese authorities' evermore undisguised moves against the DPRK and Chongryon (General Association of Korean Residents in Japan).
 Strongly condemning the Japanese authorities and police for their suppression of Chongryon and organizations under it and Koreans in Japan, the letter said this is a criminal act against Chongryon and the DPRK.    
 It reminds one of the era when the Japanese imperialists brought sanguinary crackdown on the Korean people in the past, it said, demanding the Japanese government stop at once the shameless actions against Chongryon and Koreans in Japan and respect and ensure their democratic national rights.

articles.title: 80th Anniversary of Anti-Japanese Women's Association Marked
Tailings Treatment Ground Built
Miru Plain Waterway Project Progresses Apace
Libyan Diplomatic Envoy Hosts Reception
More Relics Displayed in Chilgol Revolutionary Museum
articles.content:
Libyan Diplomatic Envoy Hosts Reception 
    Pyongyang, December 26 (KCNA) -- Bashir Ramadan Khalifa Abu Janah, secretary of the People's Bureau of the Great Socialist People's Libyan Arab Jamahiriya here, hosted a reception at the Taedonggang Club for the Diplomatic Corps on Monday on the occasions of the 15th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army and the New Year, Juche 96 (2007).
 Present on invitation were Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, Ryom Sun Gil, chairman of the Central Committee of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea who is chairman of the Korea-Libya Friendship Association, Mun Jae Chol, acting chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, and other officials concerned.
 Officials of the People's Bureau of Libya were on hand.    
 Speeches were made there.

articles.title: Superheated Campaign for Militarization in Japan Blasted
Distortion of History by Japanese Reactionaries under Fire
S. Korean Authorities Urged to Retract Decision to Dispatch Troops to Lebanon
Rodong Sinmun Reviews This Year's Achievements
Floral Basket and Congratulatory Message to Kim Jong Il
Kim Jong Il Inspects Sub-Unit of KPA Unit 3993
articles.content:
Floral Basket and Congratulatory Message to Kim Jong Il
    Pyongyang, December 26 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il was presented with a floral basket and a congratulatory message by the diplomatic corps here on the occasion of the 15th anniversary of his assumption of office as supreme commander of the Korean People's Army and the New Year Juche 96 (2007).
 The floral basket and message were conveyed to an official concerned on Tuesday by Secretary of the Libyan People's Bureau Bashir Ramadan Khalifa Abu Janah who is doyen of the diplomatic corps.
